name: Dream Boy (NinoSandlarz, ElliotFenech)
description:
Controls :

Arrow Keys : Move

F / Spacebar : Dash

D : Switch World

(Some PCs have problems capturing multiple arrows and the space bar at the same time, but you can probably fixe this problem by using F instead of Space to Dash)

Make sure to use google chrome if you want lights to display properly.

We ran out of time, so the 4th Level isn't finished yet, and the billboards that were supposed to help the player understand the mechanics remain empty.

Thank you for playing, we hope you will like it !
